card.title: GPT-4 output card title
card.prompt: text indicating the information below it is the input prompt
card.answer: text indicating the information below it is the AI answer

chat.stopGeneration: text on the stop generating button

error.noResponse: error when OpenAI server didnt response to bot request
error.outputCut: when the AI output is cut in the middle by the stop button

shitpost_cringe.commandDescription: localized description of the /shitpost cringe command.

shitpost_emoji.commandDescription: localized description of the /shitpost emoji command.
